page.title: 18HEATHROW AIRPORT
page.content: HEATHROW IS THE WORLDS BUSIEST AIRPORT.IT HANDLES MORE INTERNATIONAL PASSENGERS THAN ANY OTHER AIRPORT IN THE WORLD. THE HIGHEST NUMBER OF AIRCRAFT MOVEMENTS AT HEATHROW WAS ON JULY 19TH 1974 WHEN A TOTAL OF 986 TAKE-OFFS AND LANDINGS WERE ACHIEVED.THE MOST PASSENGERS HANDLED IN ONE HOUR WAS 103,300 ON JULY 29TH 1977.THE MOST TAKE-OFFS AND LANDINGS IN ONE HOUR WAS 78 ON JULY 8TH 1974 BETWEEN 1200-1300 GMT. DOMESTIC FLIGHTS HANDLE 3.5 MILLION PASSENGERS A YEAR.INTERNATIONAL FLIGHTS HANDLE 20.1 MILLION PASSENGERS A YEAR.THE BUSIEST INTERNATINAL ROUTE WAS HEATHROW TO PARIS WITH OVER 2.5 MILLION PASSENGERS.
